title: Is handlebars.js outdated?
post_description: I've been trying to find documentation on handlebars.js, but it's super hard! Is this really what people are using to render their websites that run on servers?

title: This is how I set up my Routes
post_description: Having your API routes all in one folder and then having one or more homeRoutes to render your page is the way to go!

title: Rimworld Modding
post_description: I wanna start playing Rimworld, and I know that game has a lot of mods... How did you modders learn how to make that stuff? It's so cool!

title: What should I do next?
post_description: I'm having a major creative block... How do you guys get inspiration for what to work on?

title: UCF Coding Bootcamp rocks!
post_description: I've learned so much! I even made a cool blog where I can have my friends create accounts and make posts about interesting content!
